thread.title: Northern rail services cost commuters £1 billion
thread.title_full: Northern rail services cost commuters £1 billion

author: Dan Hyde
title: Northern rail services cost commuters £1 billion
text: Road and rail transport Northern rail services cost commuters £1 billion Passengers on eight of the 11 lines serving southern parts of Britain put £917 million to the Government purse to subsidise train lines A report from the rail watchdog indicated passengers on eight of the 11 lines serving southern parts of Britain were paying into the pot of money used to keep the railways running in the north Photo: Alamy By Dan Hyde , Consumer Affairs Editor 10:00PM BST 27 Aug 2015
